summary: This bill, H.R. 5208, amends Title 37 of the United States Code to address the Basic Needs Allowance (BNA) for members of the Armed Forces. It specifically aims to exclude the Basic Allowance for Housing (BAH) from the calculation of gross household income for determining eligibility for the BNA. The bill was introduced on September 8, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
